Reviews.Title: LG VX8350 cell Phone Purple
Reviews.Author: Electra
Reviews.Content: Phone is fairly easy to use. Call quality is good as well as the speakers.  It's small and compact enough to carry in your pocket. I wanted a phone to make phone calls and that's what it does.

Reviews.Title: Verizon LG vx 8350
Reviews.Author: Bulldog
Reviews.Content: Mobile Life LLC did  a very quick delivery of my phone and the phone was as described on the offering.I am very happy with my purchase. Do take note that the film on the screen looks like the screen is scratched but it is not.It is just the plastic protective film that is to be removed this phone is in like new condition.And the phone I received is perfect like new condition I did activate it, and all the functions work like new thank you Mobile Life.  I can recommend this seller. I bought this at amazon .com

Reviews.Title: Very Happy
Reviews.Author: Justine
Reviews.Content: I am always a little nervous to buy phones on line but I am very happy with this purchase.  It was delivered quickly and the phone was in the stated condition. Very happy with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: like new/no it was new
Reviews.Author: wayne lazenby
Reviews.Content: I don,t belive is was used .I belive it was new.I will use this site again next time i need a phone.

Reviews.Title: Replacement Phone Was As Promised
Reviews.Author: John A. Mcmullen
Reviews.Content: The replacement LG VX8350 was in excellent condition just as promised.  All of its functions appear to work except the earphone connector yields intermittent reception on each end -- sometimes I can hear but the receiver cannot hear me and sometimes the reverse.

Reviews.Title: Adequate
Reviews.Author: Deb
Reviews.Content: The phone works fine. I expected less scratches, even though it's a refurbished unit, I guess I expected it to look new. It didn't. It definately looks like someone's used phone, but it was cheaper than a new one and it works fine.

Reviews.Title: watch out!!
Reviews.Author: wayne
Reviews.Content: I got this phone, tried to activate it and its on the lost or stolen list so I can't activate it.. so I wouldn't buy if I were you!

Reviews.Title: Great phone
Reviews.Author: Rickey Copenhaver
Reviews.Content: My old phone front glass was broken and could not see my contacts. Verizon said that they could not transfer my contacts so I bought the phone for the front glass

Reviews.Title: Verizon LG Cell Phone Great Condition
Reviews.Author: Andrea Harrod
Reviews.Content: The cell phone was used but appeared in almost new condition and seems to work fine.  We're very happy with it and appreciate the service.  My husband had lost his cell phone and we weren't quite ready to select a Smart Phone and have the bump in our monthly bill, so this phone you sent is perfect.Thanks,Andrea

Reviews.Title: Battery life problem
Reviews.Author: Daniel A. Gordon
Reviews.Content: I like the design and functionality of this reconditioned phone, but it seems that every time I charge it the battery runs down faster. After a few weeks it won't hold a charge long enough to be useful.  I don't know if it is a problem with the phone or with the battery.  I didn't have this problem with my previous LG VX8350, so I think this particular phone is defective.

Reviews.Title: phone was defective
Reviews.Author: steve
Reviews.Content: phone was defective people could not hear me talking.but had no problem returning it.should have read the reviews before i got the phone they werent good.

Reviews.Title: Best phone ever, but cracked in the hinge within a month of light use
Reviews.Author: A
Reviews.Content: Bought it because it's like my first phone, which I was desperately in love with. This phone came in what looked like good condition. Very clean. Looked like new. I was very careful so it'd last me a thousand years. But after about a month, a tiny hairline fracture in the hinge started to open up. I hadn't dropped it or anything. It became obvious that it was a refurbishing defect, a problem that was there from the previous owner. And it continued to crack further and pop.... I put some PVC pipe wrap tape on it to keep it from breaking further. This was to prevent it from closing or opening. Sad. It kept breaking more until the wires were exposed. I keep it wrapped around the hinge in PVC tape to keep it where it needs to be. It works ok. Just permanently open.  I just love this phone so much, the way it works, that I can't stand to get another phone. Great little phone. Too bad about the refurbish job not taking.

Reviews.Title: My teenager loves it!
Reviews.Author: thefinderofthings "Kelsey Graybill"
Reviews.Content: When I asked my 17 year old what kind of phone she wanted. This was it. She loves the flip phone. It works great and she's had no problems with it.

Reviews.Title: false advertisement, annoying emails and calls
Reviews.Author: Katrina Benshoof "kattyb16"
Reviews.Content: apparently i read the description wrong but i believe i read that the phone would be clean or "like new" when received but it was not, sent it back and got another phone but was also not cleaned, the phone i rate 3 because it did work, it was just not cleaned, 2 star for customer service because i was ASKED to remove my previous rating REPEATEDLY which was rather annoying, i have a life and 2 jobs so i don't really have the time to do things like this that much so the excessive calls and emails were really annoying but the replies were fast and the refund and returns were fast so decent conversation about product problem however i will not be purchasing any products from this seller again

Reviews.Title: phone
Reviews.Author: ronald maze
Reviews.Content: old one died- replaced with same simple phone rings and i have choice of answering it or not dont need fancy

Reviews.Title: Does not work
Reviews.Author: Mary Kobel
Reviews.Content: Phone did not hold charge - so worked for 2 days and cannot be recharged. It is useless at this point.

Reviews.Title: phone works well
Reviews.Author: merideth white
Reviews.Content: the phone is working well, the battery does not stay charged very long. When the phone is renewed for resale, the battery should be checked and replaced if this weak

Reviews.Title: Works well.
Reviews.Author: scottnotsohot
Reviews.Content: Only problem was with the battery they sent, but it was easily replaced. It was a great buy for under 30 bucks.

Reviews.Title: Refurbished phone
Reviews.Author: Nancy A Buckley
Reviews.Content: I was happy with the quick service.  I received my phone within 5 days.  It worked great until yesterday, it broke at the hinge just like the one I had before.  So, don't know what I will do next.

Reviews.Title: Cellphone was exact  same phone that I had previously
Reviews.Author: William B. Guyer
Reviews.Content: Phone eceeded my expectations AND came with another charger for home and another for the car. Price was very reasonable.

Reviews.Title: I was so happy to be able to replace my old flip-phone
Reviews.Author: jjrose
Reviews.Content: I have loved this style of phone and was worried about replacing it for under $25 (with shipping), but, just as the seller promised, it works fine.

Reviews.Title: The hinge broke.
Reviews.Author: David H. Ehlers
Reviews.Content: I'm glad I didn't pay much for this device, since the hinge broke on it a few weeks after I got it.  It still works, butit's kind of a flimsy phone.

Reviews.Title: Bad phone
Reviews.Author: Xander80
Reviews.Content: Don't buy this refurbished phone! The phone worked fine for a month and then just stopped working properly. It looked like the inside of the glass was humid or wet. Waste of money and too late to return to seller!

Reviews.Title: Decent Phone for Decent Price
Reviews.Author: jessmr2
Reviews.Content: It is a decent phone for a decent price.  Shipping was good.  The phone is not the greatest but thats not the sellers fault its the creator of the phones fault.  Shipper was easy to deal with.  I would rate the seller. 10 out of 10

Reviews.Title: good deal for the price
Reviews.Author: Janice McDougall
Reviews.Content: the battery doesn't hold a charge very well but we're satisfied with the phone. Our original phone went through the wash and didn't come out very well so we needed to buy an inexpensive phone and this fits the bill. Shipping was fast. I would buy it again if I needed to. I just think I'll quit doing laundry, it's getting too expensive washing phones :)

Reviews.Title: Solid phone
Reviews.Author: Erika Brandt
Reviews.Content: Nothing fancy, but works just fine. Pretty cheap plastic though...don't treat it too harshly, I think it's liable to break easily.

Reviews.Title: old phones
Reviews.Author: Aaron T. Grace "Aaron"
Reviews.Content: I downgraded from an iphone to this because i got tired of texting and internet phones. Yeah its good for an oldie, but i went back to a Samsung... oh well.

Reviews.Title: Bought this for my mom
Reviews.Author: Ayndie
Reviews.Content: Got this for my mom, worked for a week and then gave her issues so she sent it back. Been quite a while since she returned it, but I think she had issues with dropped calls or something, I can't remember, but it's refurbished. I feel awful for my mom because even offline, insured and through Verizon, they always give her a garbage phone that gives her issues when I send group messages or video to her. I try to convince her to get a smartphone...she would have a lot less problems because she doesn't do anything but the default functions of a phone and an iPhone would make things for faster for her, but she doesn't listen to me haha. What do I know?

Reviews.Title: Purchased to replace a basic phone line
Reviews.Author: Ty
Reviews.Content: Works as it should. No bells and whistles here. A bit pricey for what it is but at least it doesn't lock up!

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Kathleen Hutton
Reviews.Content: Couldn't of asked for a better phone for my child. I didn't want to sign up for another 2 years with our carrier so what a good way to go.

Reviews.Title: This phone only lasted about four months
Reviews.Author: r.w.
Reviews.Content: I purchased this phone about four months ago and the problem with the phone isThat when I talk the person can't hear me also the "ok" button on phone stop working.If that's not enough LG does not want to accept their 1 year warranty because they stop selling this item already.

Reviews.Title: Not Happy :(
Reviews.Author: Beck
Reviews.Content: Purchased the phone, received in timely manner....but when i got it, the time battery will not stay charged, it will not play the mini sd card and a screw is missing from the screen:( not happy..

ProductInfo.Features:
This product has been carefully audited and is certified to be 100% functional.
This offer includes the following accessories 1. Battery 2. Battery Cover (if applicable) 3. Wall Charger
ProductInfo.Name: Verizon LG VX8350 Cell Phone
